TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content: I thank the dev's for keeping us on our toes as another release approaches. Looking forward to 0.25 when it hits!

Guys!guys!guys! I'm 99% sure I know what it is!

Bankruptcy!

Max says it can end your space program, check,

Not done by a mod, check,

Has been guessed before, check,

Good players probably won't see it, check,

New players probably will, check.

It all makes sense...

Guys!guys!guys! I'm 99% sure I know what it is!

Bankruptcy!

Max says it can end your space program, check,

Not done by a mod, check,

Has been guessed before, check,

Good players probably won't see it, check,

New players probably will, check.

It all makes sense...

HarvesteR had fun doing it over and over?

It's a small part of the big art project for 0.26?

HarvesteR had fun doing it over and over?

It's a small part of the big art project for 0.26?

Maybe their making popups warning you when your running low on funds?

Maybe their making popups warning you when your running low on funds?

You clearly lack the power of deduction....

How is bankruptcy fun and exciting? Now blowing up the VAB is a much better time-killer.
Bankruptcy can be fun if your a kerbal bailiff.

HarvesteR had fun doing it over and over?

It's a small part of the big art project for 0.26?

Right, it's the 2nd part that makes me think it's more impact damage or something similar and not a reputation/money feature.

Guys!guys!guys! I'm 99% sure I know what it is!

Bankruptcy!

Max says it can end your space program, check,

Not done by a mod, check,

Has been guessed before, check,

Good players probably won't see it, check,

New players probably will, check.

It all makes sense...

Sorry to burst your bubble but that's a 99% awful guess

Sorry to burst your bubble but that's a 99% awful guess

You don't need to insult people...
What if there is no secret feature and they are all just laughing at our futile effort to find a non existent awesome feature.

What if there is no secret feature and they are all just laughing at our futile effort to find a non existent awesome feature.

Its just a scheme to find out, what the players really want!
The hype doesn't seem quite as intense as in 0.24... I'm not even feeling up to finishing my HypeTrain :/

You don't need to insult people...

That's the second time you said that.

Yes we are terrible people for being direct and telling you that you are terrible at thinking logically.

That's the second time you said that.

Yes we are terrible people for being direct and telling you that you are terrible at thinking logically.

You're still insulting him. You're really just making things worse.

The hype doesn't seem quite as intense as in 0.24... I'm not even feeling up to finishing my HypeTrain :/

Oh, trust me. The coal hasn't been loaded yet, we're just waiting on the platform.
Play nice, thanks guys

Oh, trust me. The coal hasn't been loaded yet, we're just waiting on the platform.

No, we've been going for several days now. I'm the driver. I would know. Also, it's HypeCoal, not Coal!

What if there is no secret feature and they are all just laughing at our futile effort to find a non existent awesome feature.

There is one and Max is revealing it on Squadcast this Friday!

there is one and max is revealing it on squadcast this friday!

hype systems engaged
Where can we find this squadcast?
Now the time has come to start walking over to the ticket counter of the Hype Shuttle/Train/Thingie. Thank you for this cool info, Rowsdower!

There is one and Max is revealing it on Squadcast this Friday!

That's what the government wants you to think.

O_O

Where can we find this squadcast?

Right here! Squadcast is on fridays, at 00:30 GMT. You can also subscribe to Twitch and then follow KSP-TV to be notified when shows start and a full schedule is available here

So, how about some release speculation hype folks. It's been nearly a week since experimentalist so I'm thinking SquadCast Friday for the final reveal, Media Release Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday Release?

Oh, trust me. The coal hasn't been loaded yet, we're just waiting on the platform.

I hope so~ I wanna see a 500-page thread again, loaded full of silliness!

No, we've been going for several days now. I'm the driver. I would know. Also, it's HypeCoal, not Coal!

Is HypeCoal greener than regular coal? Well, I guess it has one green letter, so a little bit~

So, how about some release speculation hype folks. It's been nearly a week since experimentalist so I'm thinking SquadCast Friday for the final reveal, Media Release Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday Release?

That sounds reasonable. Assuming no showstopping bugs, of course. My bet would be on that Tuesday, or if showstoppers happen, the Tuesday afterwards...
